options.content:
Flow Data by Science Discipline
  • This dashboard shows information related to science disciplines for top talkers using the NetSage Science Registry.
  • The Sankey graph shows the top ten source organizations by volume for the selected discipline(s) and organization(s) and their associated top three destination organizations, with thicker lines for larger flow volumes.
  • Note that in the Summary tables, if only one sampled flow was detected, the rate will be zero.
  • All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org) AND (meta.scireg.src.discipline:$discipline OR meta.scireg.dst.discipline:$discipline) AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

panels.title: Flow Volume for Selected Science Disciplines and Organizations

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org) AND (meta.scireg.src.discipline:$discipline OR meta.scireg.dst.discipline:$discipline) AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

panels.title: Number of Flows for Selected Science Disciplines and Organizations

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

panels.title: Total Flow Volume for Selected Organizations

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

panels.title: Total Number of Flows for Selected Organizations

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org) AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND meta.scireg.src.discipline:$discipline

panels.title: Total Flow Volume by Source of Selected Disciplines

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org) AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND meta.scireg.dst.discipline:$discipline

panels.title: Total Flow Volume by Destination of Selected Disciplines

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND meta.scireg.src.discipline:$discipline AND (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org) AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND meta.scireg.src.discipline:$discipline AND (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org) AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

options.content:
Summary of All Disciplines

Only flows where source or destination has been tagged with a science discipline
from the Science Registry and were seen by the selected sensor(s) are counted.

targets.query: meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND (meta.src_organization:$org OR meta.dst_organization:$org) AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)
